text: CKY (also known as Camp Kill Yourself) is an American band formed in 1998. In 2002, they were signed to The Island Def Jam Music Group and released Infiltrate•Destroy•Rebuild, which entered the Billboard 200 at number 99. == Discography == * Volume 1 (1999) * Infiltrate•Destroy•Rebuild (2002) * An Answer Can Be Found (2005) * Carver City (2009) * The Phoenix (2017) ==References== Category:American rock bands
title: CKY
